#summary Exclusive Features (Intermediate).
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Who should read this =

  * To follow at this point, you need be familiar with the "add" methods of NResponder. You can find all information about this here AddMethods.

= Introduction =

Base on the following table, lets see step by step the features of NResponder:

|| *Feature* || *NResponder* <br/> (Diney Bomfim) ||
|| *Used without instance* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Used with instance* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Specify number of dispatch arguments* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Dynamic dispatch arguments* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Change dispatch arguments in Run-Time* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Remove all* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Specify a delay time* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Set the number of replies* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Ordenate* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Can associate with a target* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Can pause without remove* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Can stop propagation* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Change attributes in Run-Time* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
|| *Garbage Collect* || <img src="http://db-in.com/imgs/yes.gif" title="YES" alt="YES"/> ||
